author: teruyam
body:
This is not a bug but document feedback.
Docker "Instructions" link in README is broken and shows not found (HTTP 404).
URL is [https://hub.docker.com/r/microsoft/powershell/docker](https://hub.docker.com/r/microsoft/powershell/docker)

comments.author: teruyam
comments.body:
README on Docker Hub seems not working properly.
[https://hub.docker.com/r/microsoft/powershell/](https://hub.docker.com/r/microsoft/powershell/)

comments.author: vors
comments.body: It's the same for all relative links everywhere. Docker-hub just copies `README.md` and doesn't copy the rest of documentation. The link works fine on GitHub.

title: Docker Instructions show not found
